item.spring_explosion.spark_sword.desc: Shoots sparks forward in a short range,Damage and range decrease over time.
item.spring_explosion.gyro.desc: Spins on the ground and emits sparks,Automatically tracking the nearest enemy target,Damage and range decrease over time.
item.spring_explosion.rocket_accelerator: When ignited and worn,it propels the player forward for rapid movement.
item.spring_explosion.firework_mortar.de: Fires forward in a straight line upon ignition, exploding upon hit a target or block, dealing significant explosive damage.
item.spring_explosion.firework_mine.desc: When thrown, it deploys upon hitting the ground,The mine explodes when the controller is used.
item.spring_explosion.firework_mine_cont: Used to remotely detonate the corresponding mine.
item.spring_explosion.firework_machine_g: Rapidly fires a large number of firework bullets forward,Reduces movement speed when held and applies recoil slowdown when firing.
item.spring_explosion.firecrackers.desc: When used, they are placed on the ground as the player moves,Right-clicking or using explosives on any part of the firecracker ignites it.
item.spring_explosion.firework_bomb.desc: Explodes upon hit a block or entity, dealing moderate explosive damage.
item.spring_explosion.fire_circle.desc: When placed, it emits fireworks in a circular pattern, igniting and slowing down entities that come into hit the fireworks.
item.spring_explosion.oily_bomb.desc: Explodes upon hit a block or entity, covering affected entities in oil,Oiled targets take additional explosive damage and can be ignited by fireworks or bombs.
item.spring_explosion.glowing_bomb.desc: Explodes upon hit a block or entity, applying a glowing effect to affected targets, making them visible through smoke.
item.spring_explosion.smoke_bomb.desc: Releases a large amount of opaque smoke upon landing, used for visual interference.
item.spring_explosion.frozen_bomb.desc: Explodes upon hit a block or entity, extinguishing all ignited fireworks in the area, and applying a slowing effect to affected entities.
item.spring_explosion.firework_jetpack.d: When ignited and worn, it allows the player to fly upward twice and then descend slowly.
item.spring_explosion.cracker.desc: Explodes upon hit a block or enemy player, dealing minor explosive damage.
item.spring_explosion.sticky_bomb.desc: Sticks to the target when hit and explodes after 5 seconds, dealing significant explosive damage.
item.spring_explosion.firework_missile.d: Releases a total of 9 firework missiles every 3 seconds upon ignition, which track and attack unobstructed enemy targets, dealing moderate explosive damage.
